items.sentence: Would you mind if we asked you a few questions?
Would you mind speaking a little softer please?
Would you please tell me what I should do next?
Would you rather read a novel or watch a movie?
Can you still play golf as well as you used to?
Did you hear about the big earthquake in Japan?
Tom\'s palms were sweaty and his mouth was dry.
Tom bled to death before the ambulance arrived.
Tom borrowed a large amount of money from Mary.
Tom bought a bicycle for three hundred dollars.
